subtitle: A great way to serve button mushrooms. They keep well when covered in the fridge.

method.text: Put all ingredients for marinade into a large pan. Cover, bring to boil then simmer for 5 min.
Add mushrooms, tomatoes and olives. Stir well, cover pan and simmer for 3 min. Remove mushrooms to a serving bowl. Boil the cooking liquor rapidly until reduced by half. Cool.
Discard bay leaves. Season to taste and pour over the mushrooms. Chill for 1 days before serving.

title: Mushrooms a la grecque
